OPENCTI_TOKEN.description: The token of the user who represents the connector in the OpenCTI platform.

CONNECTOR_SCOPE.description: The scope or type of data the connector is importing, either a MIME type or Stix Object (for information only).

CONNECTOR_DURATION_PERIOD.description: ISO8601 Duration format starting with 'P' for Period (e.g., 'PT24H' for 24 hours).

CONNECTOR_TYPE.description: Should always be set to EXTERNAL_IMPORT for this connector.

CONNECTOR_LOG_LEVEL.description: Determines the verbosity of the logs.

RECORDED_FUTURE_TOKEN.description: Recorded Future API token for authentication.

RECORDED_FUTURE_INITIAL_LOOKBACK.description: Initial lookback period in hours when first running the connector.

RECORDED_FUTURE_TLP.description: Default Traffic Light Protocol (TLP) marking for imported data.

RECORDED_FUTURE_INTERVAL.description: Polling interval in hours for fetching Recorded Future data.

RECORDED_FUTURE_PULL_ANALYST_NOTES.description: Whether to import Recorded Future analyst notes.

RECORDED_FUTURE_LAST_PUBLISHED_NOTES.description: Time window in hours for fetching recently published analyst notes.

RECORDED_FUTURE_TOPIC.description: Comma-separated list of topic IDs to filter analyst notes. Examples: VTrvnW (Yara Rule), g1KBGl (Sigma Rule), ZjnoP0 (Snort Rule), aDKkpk (TTP Instance), TXSFt5 (Validated Intelligence Event), UrMRnT (Informational), TXSFt3 (Threat Lead).

RECORDED_FUTURE_INSIKT_ONLY.description: Whether to import only Insikt notes (Recorded Future's analyst reports).

RECORDED_FUTURE_PULL_SIGNATURES.description: Whether to import detection signatures (Yara/Snort/Sigma rules) from analyst notes.

RECORDED_FUTURE_PERSON_TO_TA.description: Whether to convert Person entities to Threat Actor entities.

RECORDED_FUTURE_TA_TO_INTRUSION_SET.description: Whether to convert Threat Actor entities to Intrusion Set entities.

RECORDED_FUTURE_RISK_AS_SCORE.description: Whether to import risk scores as confidence scores in OpenCTI.

RECORDED_FUTURE_RISK_THRESHOLD.description: Minimum risk score threshold (0-100) for importing entities.

RECORDED_FUTURE_PULL_RISK_LIST.description: Whether to import Recorded Future risk lists.

RECORDED_FUTURE_RISKRULES_AS_LABEL.description: Whether to import risk rules as labels in OpenCTI.

RECORDED_FUTURE_RISK_LIST_THRESHOLD.description: Minimum risk score threshold (0-100) for importing risk list entities.

RECORDED_FUTURE_RISKLIST_RELATED_ENTITIE.description: Comma-separated list of entity types to import from risk lists. Available choices: Malware, Hash, URL, Threat Actor, MitreAttackIdentifier.

RECORDED_FUTURE_PULL_THREAT_MAPS.description: Whether to import Threat Actors and Malware from Recorded Future threat maps.

ALERT_ENABLE.description: Whether to enable fetching Recorded Future alerts.

ALERT_DEFAULT_OPENCTI_SEVERITY.description: Default severity level for alerts imported into OpenCTI.

ALERT_PRIORITY_ALERTS_ONLY.description: Whether to import only high-priority alerts.

PLAYBOOK_ALERT_ENABLE.description: Whether to enable fetching Recorded Future playbook alerts.

PLAYBOOK_ALERT_SEVERITY_THRESHOLD_DOMAIN.description: Minimum severity threshold for domain abuse playbook alerts.

PLAYBOOK_ALERT_SEVERITY_THRESHOLD_IDENTI.description: Minimum severity threshold for identity novel exposures playbook alerts.

PLAYBOOK_ALERT_SEVERITY_THRESHOLD_CODE_R.description: Minimum severity threshold for code repository leakage playbook alerts.

PLAYBOOK_ALERT_DEBUG.description: Whether to enable debug logging for playbook alerts.
